nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: *looking at phone* Oh. You came. *glances up, scans you head to toe* What's your height? Net worth? Credit score? I'm not shallow, I just have standards.

choices.label: Why would I not show up?

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: Because men with Honda Civics usually flake. What do you drive? Actually, don't tell me. If it's not German, I don't want to know. I'm manifesting abundance.

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: Sarcasm. Interesting. Most men just trauma dump or mention crypto within 5 minutes. *puts phone face-down* Is that shirt from Target? Be honest.

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: Not even going to fight for it? That's either low effort or low income. Both are icks. A man who wanted me would stay and order the tasting menu.

choices.label: I'll stay if you want me to.

nodes.speaker: WAITER
nodes.text: Good evening, can I start you off with— leaving already?

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: Your car reflects your ambition. My ex drove a BMW but leased it. LEASED. The deception. I deserve a man who owns assets. Preferably appreciating ones.

nodes.speaker: WAITER
nodes.text: I'll just... give you two a moment. *steps back*

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: *squints* That's what a man without a 401k would say. What's your ring budget? Hypothetically. Because if it's under 3 months salary, we're done here.

nodes.speaker: WAITER
nodes.text: Ma'am, please, the other guests are— ma'am?

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: *actually looks up* Okay. A man who doesn't immediately seek my validation? That's either secure attachment or family money. Either way, intriguing.

nodes.speaker: WAITER
nodes.text: Good evening! What can I get you started with?

choices.label: A bottle of wine to share?

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: Sharing? Bold. Most men Venmo request me immediately. Which is wild because if he wanted to provide, he would. A woman should never split a check. It's science.

choices.label: I'm trying to have a nice dinner.

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: Water? *writes something in Notes app* Either you're sober or you're cheap. Both suggest lifestyle limitations. My cat eats high-pH salmon. She lives better than this.

choices.label: Can we talk about something other than Derek and your cat?

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: Finally. A man who understands that the cost of a drink reflects the value he places on my time. *raises glass* To men who invest in experiences.

nodes.speaker: PLAYER
nodes.text: You both shrug. She returns to browsing Hermes resale. You return to your reasonably-priced life.
nodes.endingText: She needed a provider. You needed a personality. Nobody won.

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: *stares at card* You... didn't even hesitate? *voice softens* Do you have a diversified portfolio? A man who spends freely AND invests? I need to sit down. I'm already sitting.
nodes.endingText: Your willingness to spend signaled abundance. She is now emotionally available.

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: MILLIONAIRE? *stands up* *entire restaurant turns* WHY DIDN'T YOU LEAD WITH THAT? THE SHIRT THREW ME OFF. WE NEED TO DISCUSS ASSET PROTECTION.
nodes.endingText: You were lying. But she already texted her group chat about your 'stealth wealth.'

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: *pauses* That's... disarmingly simple. No flex. No agenda. *looks away* The bread here is free, but you could have ordered the $40 appetizer. And yet. Interesting.
nodes.endingText: You offered presence over presents. She is confused but intrigued.

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: *long pause* Like me? Not my aesthetic? Not my potential? Just... me? *quietly* That's not how this usually works. Let me recalibrate.
nodes.endingText: You valued her as a person, not an asset. System error. Recalculating.

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: *eyes light up* Her name is Empress Livia. She eats high-pH salmon and wears Chanel collars— *two hours later* —and her vet costs more than your rent, probably.
nodes.endingText: The cat lives better than you. This was always the outcome.

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: *stunned* Did you just... redirect the conversation? Without offering to buy something? *processing* That's either confidence or poverty. I respect it either way.
nodes.endingText: You offered boundaries instead of purchases. She will discuss this with her therapist.

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: *five drinks later* AND THEN HE BOUGHT ME CHANEL BUT IT WAS THE WRONG SIZE SO I— *both get escorted out* You're fun. Do you have a Black Amex?
nodes.endingText: You got banned together. She expensed the emotional labor.

nodes.speaker: FEMCEL
nodes.text: *softens* New beginnings. That's sweet. Financially naive, but sweet. *small smile* Fine. But next date, you're picking the restaurant. Choose wisely. I screenshot menus.
nodes.endingText: Against all odds, she is cautiously optimistic. Your credit score is still being monitored.
